                             Archiwe README

Archiwe webifies files in archive formats such as zip, tar, etc.
It is built on top of Hakmatak, the w10n enabler. WSGI/CGI applications
and command line tools are provided.

To install and configure Archiwe, please read ./INSTALL.txt.

Hakmatak is available at http://hakmatak.org.

To learn more about webification (w10n), please visit http://w10n.org.
